alert.note: Alert for Albany; Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 8:27PM MDT until June 29 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Albany County in southeastern Wyoming... West central Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 827 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium to Laramie to The Buttes, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Laramie, Tie City Campground, Vedauwoo, University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium, The Buttes, Vedauwoo Campground, Hutton Lake, Yellow Pine Campground and North Crow Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 304 and 330. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming.
